TextLibrary.Text: Prepare to be boarded! You have five minutes to hand over everything of value to us... including your ship! Do as we say or we'll take it by force.
Prepare to be boarded! You have five minutes to hand over everything of value to us... including your ship! Do as we say or we'll take it by force.
And if I surrender my ship, what happens to me?
And if I surrender my ship, what happens to me?
Ha. We'll give your body a gentle nudge in the direction of Erebus Sigma Station. You should get back in about 20 years.
Ha. We'll give your body a gentle nudge in the direction of Erebus Sigma Station. You should get back in about 20 years.
That's what I thought... Well, as an Agent of the MRI Corporation, I order you to cease this illegal mining or I will fire upon you.
That's what I thought... Well, as an Agent of the MRI Corporation, I order you to cease this illegal mining or I will fire upon you.
MRI Agent eh? We can't have your type coming around here spoiling our fun...
MRI Agent eh? We can't have your type coming around here spoiling our fun...
